name: Dana R.
text: Great price and extremely fast shipping our phones arrived to our doorstep in 4 days :) almost too good to be true

name: Marcus L.
text: The down payment was affordable! support answered my questions like white on rice lol

name: Jasmine K.
text: the iphone 14 was refurbished but 100% great shape basically like new im happy. thats what matters.

name: Omar S.
text: No credit check just like they promised suprisingly ,super easy & super affordable .

name: Tina P.
text: Kept my number with verizon wireless it was honestly painless i only had to pop my sim card in and boom good to go...

name: De'quan W.
text: heard of yall from a tiktok i second guessed it at first cuz the price was so low i realized after that they are refurbished  still came in perfect condition basically brand new
